data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hemp, Claudia (2017): Neotype designation for Plangia graminea (Serville, 1838) and two new Plangia species from Tanzania, East Africa (Orthoptera: Tettigoniidae: Phaneropterinae). Zootaxa 4324 (1): 180-188, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4324.1.10|5 occurrences
